name: Disney by Loungefly Wallet Hocus Pocus Sanderson Sisters House
description:
Open the door to frightfully fun adventures with our Loungefly Disney Hocus Pocus Sanderson Sisters' House Zip-Around Wallet. The cozy-looking house, with warmly lit windows and puffs of smoke rising through the chimney, comes to life in applique and debossed detail. The Sanderson Sisters are there at the door to greet Dani Dennison and Max Dennison as they approach with their jack-o'-lantern candy buckets. In the dark, the windows of the house glow! On the back, the Sanderson Sisters make a grand encore appearance, with the words "Come, We Fly!" in gold print. Inside, there are 4 slots for holding cards and 1 clear slot for displaying your ID. A die-cut crescent moon shape on the clear slot adds a bewitching touch. Haunt your next housewarming party or simply make a spellbinding entrance wherever you go. The Loungefly Disney Hocus Pocus Sanderson Sisters' House Zip-Around Wallet is made of vegan leather (polyurethane). Wallet zips closed with gold-colored hardware. Additional features include applique, debossed, glow-in-the-dark, and printed details. Take note of the coordinating inside lining. This wallet is an officially licensed Disney product. Wallet dimensions: 6"W x 4"H

- Material: 100% PU Leather
- Size: 20 x 2,5 x 10 cm
